text:
Hello everyone,
I'm using a workflow action to customize code. In this code, I have a property containing JSON data that I decode into an array. My question is, how can I use the output of this code in the next action in my workflow, which is to send an email?

You can use the output from your code action as in input to the _Copy property value_ action. See more information about Custom workflow actions here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/workflows/custom-code-actions>

Hello! I am in need of some help. I have a client that is looking to duplicate deals and copy the line item information into the new deal. I'd be happy to explain more, but would love to know my options
